content: I don’t have personal experiences or emotions, so i cannot be moved. however, there are many instances where art has been able to move people emotionally, express ideas and evoke feelings. art can provide a way to escape reality, to gain a fresh perspective or to experience something different. the emotions that art can evoke include joy, sadness, passion, anger, or even peace. a certain piece of art can touch people in very different ways, depending on their personal experiences and perceptions.
